[Groovy] Class ModuleBuilder

java.lang.Object
  ModuleBuilder

class ModuleBuilder

Implements the DSL for a resource as part of a module. Is designed to be reused for multiple invocations. The caller is responsible for clearing the given resources and dependencies between invocations.

Authors:
Marc Palmer (marc@grailsrocks.com)
Luke Daley (ld@ldaley.com)
